components.templateData:
@perfectmemory/ngx-contextmenu

Base Case

  • Right Click ltr: {{ item?.name }}
  • Right Click rtl: {{ item?.name }}
{{ disableBasicMenu ? 'enable' : 'disable' }} basic menu

Static

  • Right Click: {{ item?.name }}
Say hi This will never show... Bye, someone

Enabled and Visible

  • Right Click: {{ item?.name }}
Say hi, {{ item?.name }}! With access to the outside context: {{ outsideValue }} This will never show... Bye, {{ item?.name }} Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler










Enabled and Visible as Functions

  • Right Click: {{ item?.name }}
Say hi! (enabled for John) Say hi! (visible for Joe) Bye, {{ item?.name }}

Custom styling

  • Right click to see styled menu
Say... ...hi! ...hi! ...hola! ...salut! ...hola! ...salut! Bye, {{ item?.name }} ...bye! ...ciao! ...au revoir! I am disabled very long text to check if if fills into the space it has Input something: Say... ...hi! ...hi! ...hola! ...salut! ...hola! ...salut! Bye, {{ item?.name }} ...bye! ...ciao! ...au revoir! I am disabled very long text to check if if fills into the space it has Input something: This menu is styled with a custom class that needs to be global
{{ item.name }}
Say hi! Bye, {{ item?.name }}
  • {{ item.name }} {{ action.html(item) }} Submenu Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler Filler

variables.name: evaluateIfFunction
variables.defaultValue:
<T>(
  value: boolean | ((value?: T) => boolean),
  item?: T
): boolean => {
  if (value instanceof Function) {
    return value(item);
  }
  return value;
}

projects/ngx-contextmenu/src/lib/helper/.defaultValue:
<T>(
  value: boolean | ((value?: T) => boolean),
  item?: T
): boolean => {
  if (value instanceof Function) {
    return value(item);
  }
  return value;
}
